text: The 2018 Humpty's Champions Cup is the final Grand Slam of curling event of the 2017–18 curling season. It was held April 24-29, 2018 at the WinSport Arena, Canada Olympic Park, in Calgary, Alberta. ==Men== ===Teams=== The teams are listed as follows:http://www.thegrandslamofcurling.com/curling/champions- cup/2018-humptys-champions-cup-mens-teams/ {| class=wikitable |- !
